statements: SELECT * FROM CyberbullyingEvidence;
SELECT incident_id, victim_name, bully_name FROM CyberbullyingEvidence;
SELECT timestamp, victim_name, evidence_details FROM CyberbullyingEvidence WHERE bully_name = 'John';
SELECT * FROM CyberbullyingEvidence ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT incident_id, victim_name, bully_name FROM CyberbullyingEvidence WHERE timestamp >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM CyberbullyingEvidence WHERE victim_name = 'Alice' AND bully_name = 'Bob' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT incident_id, victim_name, evidence_details FROM CyberbullyingEvidence WHERE bully_name = 'Charlie';
SELECT * FROM CyberbullyingEvidence WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT victim_name, count(*) as total_incidents FROM CyberbullyingEvidence GROUP BY victim_name ORDER BY total_incidents DESC;
SELECT incident_id, victim_name, bully_name, timestamp FROM CyberbullyingEvidence WHERE evidence_details LIKE '%threat%';
SELECT * FROM CyberbullyingIncidents WHERE id = 1;
SELECT description, incident_date FROM CyberbullyingIncidents WHERE incident_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM CyberbullyingUsers ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT id, description FROM CyberbullyingIncidents WHERE reported_by = 'Anonymous';
SELECT username, role FROM CyberbullyingUsers WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM CyberbullyingIncidents WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, incident_date, reported_by FROM CyberbullyingIncidents WHERE reported_by = 'User123';
SELECT * FROM CyberbullyingUsers WHERE last_login > '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, email FROM CyberbullyingUsers WHERE role = 'Admin' ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT id, description, evidence_url FROM CyberbullyingIncidents WHERE incident_date >= '2022-03-01' ORDER BY incident_date;
SELECT * FROM CyberbullyingIncidents;
SELECT victim_name, bully_name, incident_date FROM CyberbullyingIncidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT id, victim_name, bully_name, incident_date FROM CyberbullyingIncidents WHERE victim_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CyberbullyingIncidents WHERE incident_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT victim_name, bully_name, evidence FROM CyberbullyingIncidents WHERE bully_name='Jessica' ORDER BY victim_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM CyberbullyingIncidents;
SELECT victim_name, bully_name, incident_date FROM CyberbullyingIncidents WHERE incident_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT reporter_name, email FROM Reporters ORDER BY reporter_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM ActionsTaken WHERE action_description LIKE 'Suspension%';
SELECT id, reporter_name, email, phone_number FROM Reporters JOIN CyberbuljsonlyingIncidents ON Reporters.id = CyberbullyingIncidents.id;
SELECT * FROM Evidence;
SELECT victim_name, bully_name, incident_date FROM Evidence;
SELECT * FROM Attachments WHERE evidence_id = 1;
SELECT commenter_name, comment, comment_id FROM Comments ORDER BY comment_id DESC;
SELECT tag_name FROM Tags WHERE evidence_id = 3 ORDER BY tag_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Evidence;
SELECT victim_name, incident_date FROM Evidence WHERE id = 3;
SELECT bully_name, description FROM Evidence WHERE incident_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM Attachments JOIN Evidence ON Attachments.evidence_id = Evidence.id;
SELECT comment, commenter_name FROM Comments WHERE evidence_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM cyberbullying_reports;
SELECT report_id, reporter_name, report_date FROM cyberbullying_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT reporter_name, incident_description FROM cyberbullying_reports WHERE incident_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM reported_user ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT post_text AS post_content, post_date AS creation_date FROM reported_post WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM cyberbullying_reports;
SELECT reporter_name, report_date, incident_description FROM cyberbullying_reports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM reported_user ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT post_text, post_date, username FROM reported_post JOIN reported_user ON reported_post.user_id = reported_user.user_id;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_reports, SUM(reported_count) AS total_reported_count FROM cyberbullying_reports JOIN cyberbullying_statistics ON cyberbullying_reports.report_id = cyberbullying_statistics.stat_id;
